org.treetank.cache
Class AbstractPersistenceCache

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.cache.AbstractPersistenceCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICache
Direct Known Subclasses:
BerkeleyPersistenceCache, TransactionLogCache
public abstract class AbstractPersistenceCache
extends Object
implements ICache

Abstract class for holding all persistence caches. Each instance of this class stores the data in a place related to the ResourceConfiguration at a different subfolder.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

          Place to store the data.
